title: label-erode
description:
Erode a label file.

Around each vertex that is unlabeled, set surrounding vertices to unlabeled.  The surrounding vertices are all immediate neighbors and all vertices within the specified distance.

Note that the -corrected-areas option uses an approximate correction for distance along the surface.

erode_dist.title: erode_dist
erode_dist.description: distance in mm to erode the labels

opt_roi_roi_metric.title: opt_roi_roi_metric
opt_roi_roi_metric.description: assume values outside this roi are labeled: metric file, positive values denote vertices that have data

opt_column_column.title: opt_column_column
opt_column_column.description: select a single column to erode: the column number or name

opt_corrected_areas_area_metric.title: opt_corrected_areas_area_metric
opt_corrected_areas_area_metric.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric
